thoughts.text: GV English offers General English, English for Academic Purposes, Business English, and English Exam Preparation courses in both Calgary and Victoria, Canada. They also offer Private English Lessons and Pathway programs. Test Centres for the Celpip and IELTS exams are available, along with services such as a Free English Level Check and Visa & Immigration assistance. Accommodations and activities are also provided. I should continue browsing other language school websites to compare options and make a decision.
thoughts.reasoning: Browsing other websites will give me more options and help me make an informed decision.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to browse other language school websites
- Take notes on the programs that interest me
- Compare the options and decide on a course or destination to pursue first
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not getting overwhelmed by too many options and that I am making a decision in a timely manner.
